title: Hail of Blades Jhin Bug

embed.title: Potential Jhin Hail of Blades Bug/Glitch?
embed.description: I seem to have found a bug where, with HoB active, the 4th basic attack seems to act just like a regular auto attack, instead of the missing health damage execution. I think it might have to do with having 100% crit chance with HoB but I honestly have no idea so I hope a Riot member sees this and can explain/investigate/fix this.

body:
Der Bug im Video ist noch nicht behoben. Hail of Blades verhindert wohl irgendwie das der Letzte Autohit keinen erhöhten Schaden macht (execute).
Habe es selbst getestet und auch einen Freund testen lassen.
